title: Housing finance companies’ gross NPAs may rise to 3.6-3.8% in Q4 FY22 - The Financial Express
content: Housing finance companies’ gross NPAs may rise to 3.6-3.8% in Q4 FY22  The Financial Express
description: Analysts believe GNPAs would rise further post-September 2022, when the November 12 circular of the central bank will be adopted by all housing finance companies (HFCs).
